function.name: dehumidificationMode_setValue
function.description: This function is used to set the mode of a SmartThings dehumidifier device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set the dehumidification mode.

predefinedDehumidificationMode.description: The predefined dehumidification mode to set.

mode.description: The mode to set for the dehumidification mode.
